description: A classic hummus recipe with a nutty twist makes for a delicious but different snack
keywords: Hummus,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free
name: Macadamia Nut Hummus with Crudites Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 small carrot, washed, peeled and sliced lenghtways
0.5 small cucumber, washed, peeled and sliced lenghtways
0.5 small celery, washed, peeled and sliced lenghtways

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and slice your carrot, cucumber and leek and leave to one side.
Blend the rest of your ingredients together until a smooth consistency is reached.
Serve the hummus alongside the crudites.
